name: FastDischargeAccu
title: Fast Discharge Accu
author: Zinovic
description: Adds a fast discharge-low capacity accumulator. For use in isolating power grids with a high throughput, requiring fewer accumulators overall. Intended for use with nuclear power where steam engines need to only be brought in to deal with power spikes. See: wiki.factorio.com/Accumulator#Isolation_of_Power_Networks
